About Me

I'm a web developer who loves to learn. I'm always reading book after book on front end development, whether it be books on the theory behind design to JavaScript design patterns. I try to help others with the knowledge I have; you can find me participating at Stack Overflow. The rest of my downtime dedicated to front end development is spent working on some projects of mine.

Books

List of books I've read recently:

  • Responsive Web Design - Ethan Marcotte
  • HTML and CSS: Design and Build Websites - Jon Duckett
  • JavaScript Patterns - Stoyan Stefanov
  • JavaScript: The Good Parts - Douglas Crockford
  • Eloquent JavaScript: A Modern Introduction to Programming 2nd Edition - Marijn Haverbeke
